I have been struggling with my weight and body temperature for over a decade since I suffered a traumatic brain injury in January 2011. As a result, finding a good jacket is EXCEPTIONALLY difficult! I recently lost nearly fifty (50) pounds, making it a tad easier. I own four marvelous, comfortable Coofandy shirts, so I thought I'd try this jacket. WOW! It's extremely breathable unlike my old jacket but still keeps my body warm. The arms are maybe a TAD too long, but only just barely. Otherwise it fits great. It's also maybe a TAD too heavy, but again it's not BAD. The pockets are nice and big and the zipper is easy to . . . zip. As you can see, *I* think it's a VERY nice-looking jacket as well!

The COOFANDY Men's Lightweight Bomber Jacket is a stylish and versatile addition to my wardrobe. The jacket's lightweight design makes it perfect the light winters we get in Phoenix, offering just the right amount of warmth without being too heavy. I love the textured material, which gives it a unique and modern look, and the zip-up closure is smooth and durable. The pockets are a nice touch, offering plenty of space for essentials like a phone or wallet. The fit is comfortable and true to size, making it easy to layer over a t-shirt or hoodie. Whether you're dressing up or keeping it casual, this jacket works for any occasion. Overall, it's a great value for the price and highly recommended!
We bought this for our teenage grandson who loves it. It’s a good quality fabric and workmanship. Glad we bought it for him. Nice looking jacket

I needed a lightweight fall jacket and this one pleased me when it arrived. While still a light jacket, I liked that it was a little heavier and more substantial than I expected; the cloth flourishes on the sleeve ends and jacket bottom  were attractive; and the rust color I picked was subdued but still stood out a bit. Also, the two outside pockets are supplemented by a roomy inside pocket for added convenience. It’s not yet fall here, but I got a chance to wear the jacket out on a couple of recent cooler summer nights, and I really liked the way it felt and looked on me. So, yes, this is a nice jacket that will probably please most buyers.
Very poor packageing, garment wrinkled. It had. To be 📤 to cleaners to be pressed extra charge 6.00$
Nice fit, texture and color

I was kind of excited for this one. I was hoping it would be a jacket that I could wear to work and hit that sweet spot between formal and casual. I'm 6'1" and have a skinny athletic build. This fit me like an elephant skin.  The material just looked off, I think it was the strange texture. It also wasn't super comfortable.  It seemed well made and I suppose that my expectations were just not met and that is my biggest complaint.

I am looking forward to winter with this jacket, it fits great, is super soft, and as advertised it's pretty lightweight. Not exactly the jacket you want for a snow storm, but likely perfect for those few too-cold days in the south. The sizing seems pretty accurate and the color I received matches the photos pretty well!

Love the color and contrast on this jacket.  It is lined and felt really good.  It looks well made.  Only problem was the recommended size for me, large, was just too big.  I am 6', 172, and wear a medium shirt.  I thought the jacket would be ok with a shirt or sweater underneath, but the size was just too big.  Other reviewers have mentioned size as an issue.  I would recommend a size down if you are not over weight.  It does have plenty of room for a large belly.

Falls on the casual end of the range, but would work well for business casual as well (imho).  Fits my son well and has a smooth, clean, classic bomber jacket appeal.  It will be work well in the Spring and Fall in our area.  He is 6"1"/190 lbs and the L was sized well.  The slash pockets are nice, the inner pocket won't hold my son's phone but will hold the mandatory pack of gum and other small items.  The sleeves and waist are both banded.  He likes it (most importantly) so I will probably see it frequently (thankfully it's machine washable:)

The color is great, the material is very heavy and is textured- it’s not a smooth fabric and would not be waterproof.  It’s well made, there’s an interior chest pocket as well as two outer pockets.  It’s also true to size and the zipper is smooth.

I think one of the things I hate most on windbreakers are the sounds it makes when you're moving around. It's actually nice that this one seems to have some sort of thicker outershell so it doesn't make that crinkling plastic sliding sound when I'm moving around or typing at my desk.  It does keep me well heated when sitting at my desk at work since the office temp is like 74. I'm sure there are people out there who like a cold environment but I can't stand it. Now I have a jacket that I'll be primarily be using at the office.

评论概述: Fits Well, Cool Styling, Inner Pockets, Interesting Material
评论详情: I found this jacket fits well. I usually wear large and that is what I ordered. The styling looks cool and I have gotten compliments on it. I wouldn't say it is especially warm, but it's adequate for a cool night. I love that it includes an inner pocket. I always use those. The material is interesting. Not sure exactly how to describe it. It's like a stretchy material unlike any other jacket I own. I would still recommend this but I wouldn't make it my every day jacket.

Very nice quality jacket.  Almost feels like putting on a blazer.  The jacket has textures on it which gives it a stylish and elegant look to it.  It fits exactly like a bomber jacket so it's a bit on the looser side yet still looks great.  The jacket does feel much heavier than other bomber jacket that I have and also seems thicket and warmer to wear.  Have yet to test it in the colder weather but I presume that since it seems to retain heat it might be a good jacket for colder weather.  Pockets are good and can fit your hands and phone devices.  Zipper works well without issue.

评论概述: Good fit, feels like stitched pretty well
评论详情: Bought this as a medium and it fit as I would expect any medium lightweight jacket to fit. The feel of the jacket is good when you put it in. I can't really say right now how well it'll keep you warm on a cooler day since I got it in the summer, but initial impression is that it should do the job in the mid-40s on up.
Material is lightweight. pockets are deep enough to hold cell phone. Have rubbed cuffs. Retro, good for cool weather.
This bomber is incredibly cool looking but not overly attention-drawing. I love it. Has a form fitting size to it as well and it is comfortable in air conditioned areas

Disclaimer: Product descriptions typically provide information about what products claim to do, so I like to focus my reviews more on the negative aspects of products to make other people aware of issues or concerns before purchasing. My reviews are based on specific tests that I conduct, so others may not experience the same results or share the same opinion.  Overview: I was looking for a causal plain black jacket to wear with jeans or chinos and found this product by COOFANDY, which is a trusted brand that I've purchased before.  Negative(s): -Thickness -Weight -Sizing  Do any of the negative(s) affect my overall rating and/or recommendation? No. Although this jacket wasn't quite lightweight and thin, it's still a quality product. It's thicker than a windbreaker, which is usually made of thin, lightweight nylon, the material of the outer layer is like a cotton/polyester blend with a nylon lining. I'm 5'7" and about 200lbs., and I wear a Medium or Large jacket depending on the style and material. I was expecting this to fit like a windbreaker so I ordered a size Medium, but surprisingly, even though it's thick, the Medium fit perfectly. Depending on how you want this to fit, I suggest staying the same for a slightly standard to baggy fit or a size down for a more fitted look.  Overall, I'm really happy with this product and I would highly recommend this product.
This fit perfectly! It looks as advertised and it is heavier than you'd think. It will be a great coat for the winter.

COOFANDY Men's Lightweight Bomber Jacket arrived in a vacuum packed and sealed bag. When bag was opened there was no bad smell. The fabric is nice. The elastic cuffs, collar, bottom is strong. Seams are straight. Zipper slides with ease. Inner pocket holds a full-size phone. Outside hand pockets generous. Inner lining silky. Fit; true to size.  COOFANDY Men's Lightweight Bomber Jacket is as advertised and will be a staple fall and spring jacket.

评论概述: Nice jacket but runs big to me
评论详情: My son like the jacket, I should of trusted my instance and got a small..the medium fit fine but make my son look bulky with the jacket. It's soft and lightweight with a hidden pocket on the insdeide. Very well made the color is true as the image. It looks like it runs big

I must say when I put this coat on, it feels very classy and looks fashion-toward. It gives an awesome Euro-vibe, and I love it. It's heavy enough to hold off windy weather and some of the chill, but not too heavy to make it look like you put on 20 kilos either. I love how it makes me look. Great for the casual going out look during day or night.
The fabric is better than expected.  A good sturdy fabric that might keep me warm on chilly fall days while also light enough to be worn on a very warm day.  The style is interesting.

评论概述: The Look Is Fine, the Feel Gives Me Pause
评论详情: Out of the package, this light coat weighs 1 pound 4.25 ounces.  It looks well put together, even on close inspection. The various components are even on both sides, the hems seem good, the ribbing at the bottoms and around the collar is well sewn on. I got the light gray one, and it has the standard sports coat lining in the sleeves, as well as the main body of the item.  I have an odd feeling about the fabric, though. It looks neat enough, though it's a little wrinkled out of the package, but I suspect that an item that's 97% polyester will be fine once washed.  I wish I liked the feel of the outer fabric, in fact, the feel of the piece as a whole. It drapes well enough, so I don't mean the fit. But it just has a very unusual synthetic feel to it that doesn't feel quite right to me. Hopefully, long sleeves underneath will alleviate some of that, but the outside seems like a highly manufactured product, too. I know that sounds strange, given that nearly all our clothing is indeed manufactured, but all I can say is that this jacket gives me a stronger such impression, mostly because of the notably synthetic feel.  Fortunately, before ordering, I looked at their size chart, which says that my 39 chest / 30 waist should take a small (and according to their chart, any chest up to 44 needs a "small"), so that's what I got, and it fits like my regular medium jackets. So you might want to go down one size from your regular.  My only "issue" with this is its unusually synthetic nature. For what it is, they've done a perfectly satisfactory job, so 4 stars seems fair in view of everything.

To start with I am 5' 10" tall, 160 lbs., 34 waist and I got the medium jacket in khaki color.  Before I get to what I like about the jacket, I wanted to mention the color is not khaki and looks more like a cream color to me.  The shorts that I'm wearing are khaki so you can compare the difference.  And for the record, I don't dislike the color but wanted to point the difference out.On to what I like about this jacket and why I would recommend it.  There are numerous colors to choose from so no problem getting one that fits into your wardrobe.  I also like the color contrast between the jacket, the elastic waist,  collar and cuffs which make for an attractive and stylish jacket.I ordered medium and you will see by my pics that the sleeves bunch up a bit at the wrist.  That is okay though because there is plenty of room when you are moving around, driving the car, etc.  If you prefer a slim fit Jacket perhaps a size smaller might be considered.  Also, I like that the waist comes down a little further so when I sit down the jacket will not ride up my back.Side pockets are a good depth as well as the inside pocket which holds my 6.5 inch phone perfectly.  None of the pockets have zippers.The material is soft and has a little bit of stretch to it and can be machine washed.  The jacket is a bit heavier than an unlined jacket and should definitely keep you comfortable on those colder Spring/Fall days.Coofandy did a respectable job with this jacket and sells it for a competitive price.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone in the market for this style jacket.

评论概述: lightweight but also really solid jacket
评论详情: I have ordered many shirts from COOFANDY and have liked every one of them so far-so I expected I would like this jacket and yes indeed, I truly do. When you slip it on it has a soft silky feel to it and it seems extremely lightweight yet it also has a subtly solid vibe to it as well. The sleeves are substantial. I just dig the heft of them.  I ordered it in green. I love the dark accents on the collar and at the wrists. It fits perfectly to my size. The sleeves are just the right length and that is a rare thing to experience because I have long arms and expect the cuffs to ride up on me and these don't. Not tight around the torso either as some of these kinds of jackets can be. I appreciate that.  Very pleased with this well made outerwear. Perfect for spring, fall, and those cool summer nights.

This is a very nice lightweight jacket.  It is very well made of quality material, fits just right, is just the right weight and looks fantastic.  I love the nice silk type lining, it feels great.  The sleeve length is right, the pockets are nicly placed and the zipper works flawlessly.  Very deserving of a five star rating.

The first thing I noticed about this jacket is that it is heavy, like it physically feels like it has been weighted down, I checked the pockets to make sure there wasn't a roll of quarters in there.  The color is lovely, light and it goes with practically everything. The neck is a good size even when fully zipped up. The sleeves are the correct length, not too long nor so short that his wrists are showing.  The light green fabric is sorta pebbly, like fabric gravel, I know that isn't the correct word to use for this, it is the opposite of smooth, but it isn't woven looking. Sorry, I am running out of adjectives today .  The lining is smooth and satin-y looking and it went through the washing machine on cool and then into the dryer for just 25 minutes on low heat, it was still damp, but I don't want it to shrink.
This is a well made jacket that fit perfectly. It is true to size and is lined. There is an inside pockets and two pockets on the outside.  This will be a great jacket for Spring/Fall.
It feels cheap, and one would sweat in it. Maybe good for cool weather. Even the lining doesn't breath well.

评论概述: Decent, modestly priced casual jacket of reasonable quality
评论详情: Got this COOFANDY windbreaker / jacket to replace an existing 15+ year old Lacoste jacket that has seen better days.  Considering the price point, it is a worthy replacement for casual circumstances or my intended use which is as a lightweight, short length car coat.The construction appears to be as expected – color-matched stitching was strong and straight on all seams.  Elastic at the waist, sleeve ends, and neck well attached with no bunching. Color-matched zipper of plastic material operated freely in both directions.  Has an inside left-breast pocket large enough for a regular sized cell phone.  Outside pockets large enough for a man-sized hand but no more.  Not particularly deep and no zipper, Velcro, or other closure.Came fairly wrinkled but pressed out nicely.  The navy blue color fabric and elastic is quite dark.  Interior lining is black.  Being a solid color jacket, it is very basic looking.  I like it but the wife describes it as bland.  The fabric appears to be sturdy but being polyester does have a budget feel to it.For size comparison, I am 6’1” and typically wear a dress shirt with a 20” neck and 36 inch sleeve length.  For pants it is a 54” waist. The 2x size I got fit me comfortably everywhere except the mid-section (belly).  If, like me, your mid-section is a victim of significant consumption of grain-based adult beverages such that it is materially larger in diameter than your waist, take that into consideration when looking at the seller size chart and purchasing this jacket.  I could not zip mine at all (and it was not close).  For me, this is not an issue as I don’t normally wear jackets zipped when driving but if you expect to wear it zippered, take note.  Objectively, it appears to run accurate to the size chart in the product description.All in all, for what I expect to use it for the jacket is satisfactory and does not break the budget.  Certainly not on the same level as the one it replaced but not near the cost either.  I do not expect to get 15 years of wear out of it either but it does feel, at least initially, that I should last several seasons at a minimum.  Of courts I have only had it a week and therefore, cannot really opine on durability in regular use.Considering price, features, construction, and appearance, a 4 to 4.5 star item.  Since there are no half-stars in Amazon land, it gets a solid 4.DISCLAIMER:  I am a member of the Amazon Vine program.  This means that I receive some products free of charge to use and review.  I only request/accept items I will actually use.  My reviews are based on this real-world usage – they are not mere regurgitations of the Amazon product description or insincere hype.  I am not a shill and I do not consider the fact that an item was provided without charge as part of my ratings.  I have given Vine products one star, five stars, and all points in between.  I put serious effort into my reviews and they represent my honest opinion of the product.  My hope it they will help someone make an informed, educated choice whether or not a product is right for them.

评论概述: Very nice looking, light weight jacket
评论详情: We're in the throes of summer, so it won't get a lot of use yet, but I got this jacket for my 15 yo to wear to church.  It's very dressy looking, but light weight.  Fits as expected and he really liked the style.  It's impossible to shop for them at that age, but it looks sharp and I love the color.  Zippers worked as expected, no snags, no loose threads.  Very nice.
